options.name: Season Length
options.description: The number of turns that normally pass before a new Noble takes their turn (defaults to 80)

options.name: Master of the Hunt Enabled
options.description: A Fey Noble who empowers heroes and agents to do great and terrible deeds (defaults to true)

options.name: Painter of Winds Enabled
options.description: A Fey Noble who spreads darkness and chaos from place to place on the currents of wind (defaults to true)
